team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The passionate individuals behind ZAMINAT.eco, working together to create a sustainable future for Uzbekistan through innovation and community engagement.

sukhrobjon.name: Sukhrobjon Rikhsiboev
sukhrobjon.description: Visionary leader driving ZAMINAT.eco's mission to transform waste management into a sustainable social movement across Uzbekistan.
achievements: Leading plastic and rubber recycling initiative

azamat.name: Azamat Elchibekov
azamat.description: Operations expert ensuring efficient execution of sustainability programs and community engagement initiatives.

khondamir.name: Khondamir Alibekov
khondamir.description: Financial expert managing budgets, reporting, and ensuring transparent financial operations for all sustainability projects.

islombek.name: Islombek Rakhimov
islombek.description: Technology specialist developing and maintaining the ZAMINAT.eco platform, ensuring seamless user experience and system reliability.

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.description: We're always looking for passionate individuals who share our vision of creating a sustainable future. Join our team and make a real impact.
